## Transform.rotate() method

Applies a rotation of euler angles around the x, y and z axis.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rotate(axis: Vector3, angle: number): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis | <code>Vector3</code> |  |
|  angle | <code>number</code> |  |
